sentences.sContent: That alternative is to bring freedom back into existence by taking it back - back to the love of freedom, to our lifeway.
sentences.sContent_eng: That alternative is to bring freedom back into existence by taking it back - back to the love of freedom, to our lifeway.
sentences.sCn: 那选择是把自由带回生活存在 夺回来 回到自由的爱 回到我们生活的路.

sentences.sContent: Such must lead to a conceptual revolution of human being's future lifeway by which Smart Card be the most important, most convenient and most indispensable tool in the 21st century.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such must lead to a conceptual revolution of human being's future lifeway by which Smart Card be the most important, most convenient and most indispensable tool in the 21st century.
sentences.sCn: 这必将导致全人类未来生活方式的概念性演变，从而使智能卡成为21世纪人类最重要、最便利、最不可缺的工具。
